suite.name: UI Tests

test.name: Validate the UITAP tab in chrome browser

kw.name: Click on UITAP tab in chrome browser
kw.doc: Validate that the UITAP tab is clickable and navigates to the main page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="citation"]/p' contains exact text 'Quality is not an act, it is a habit.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: The purpose of this website is to provide a platform for sharpening UI test automation skills. Use it to practice with your test automation tool. Use it to learn test automation techniques.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="description"]/div/div/div[1]/div/span' contains exact text 'The purpose of this website is to provide a platform for sharpening UI test automation skills. Use it to practice with your test automation tool. Use it to learn test automation techniques.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Different automation pitfalls appearing in modern web applications are described and emulated below.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="description"]/div/div/div[1]/p' contains exact text 'Different automation pitfalls appearing in modern web applications are described and emulated below.'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Validate Dymanic ID link
kw.doc: Validate that the Dynamic ID link is clickable, that it navigates to the Dynamic ID page and that the button is clickable

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="overview"]/div/div[1]/div[1]/h3/a' contains exact text 'Dynamic ID'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Make sure you are not recording dynamic IDs of elements
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="overview"]/div/div[1]/div[1]/p' contains exact text 'Make sure you are not recording dynamic IDs of elements'.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/h3' contains exact text 'Dynamic ID'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Modern applications often generate dynamic IDs for elements. In this case ID is not a reliable attribute for using in element selector. By default many UI automation tools record IDs and this results in tests broken from the very beginning. An automation tool needs a way to instruct it to skip dynamic IDs when XPath is generated for an element.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/p' contains exact text 'Modern applications often generate dynamic IDs for elements. In this case ID is not a reliable attribute for using in element selector. By default many UI automation tools record IDs and this results in tests broken from the very beginning. An automation tool needs a way to instruct it to skip dynamic IDs when XPath is generated for an element.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/ul/li[1]' contains exact text 'Record button click.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Then execute your test to make sure that ID is not used for button identification.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/ul/li[2]' contains exact text 'Then execute your test to make sure that ID is not used for button identification.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Validate Text Input link
kw.doc: Validate that the Text Input link is clickable, that it navigates to the Text Input page and that the button text can be changed to something new

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="overview"]/div/div[2]/div[4]/h3/a' contains exact text 'Text Input'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Entering text into an edit field may not have effect
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="overview"]/div/div[2]/div[4]/p' contains exact text 'Entering text into an edit field may not have effect'.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/h3' contains exact text 'Text Input'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Entering text with physical keyboard can be different from sending DOM events to an element. This page is specifically desined to illustrate this problem. There are cases when attempts to set a text via DOM events lead to nowhere and the only way to proceed is to emulate real keyboard input at OS level.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/p' contains exact text 'Entering text with physical keyboard can be different from sending DOM events to an element. This page is specifically desined to illustrate this problem. There are cases when attempts to set a text via DOM events lead to nowhere and the only way to proceed is to emulate real keyboard input at OS level.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Record setting text into the input field and pressing the button.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/ul/li[1]' contains exact text 'Record setting text into the input field and pressing the button.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Then execute your test to make sure that the button name is changing.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/ul/li[2]' contains exact text 'Then execute your test to make sure that the button name is changing.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/html/body/section/div/form/div/label' contains exact text 'Set New Button Name'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Testing Button' into text field 'id=newButtonName'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="updatingButton"]' contains exact text 'Testing Button'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
